title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 341.11 - Election of officers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 341.11 - Election of officers

State Regulations

Officers shall be elected by the members of the student
assembly at its annual business meeting. To stand for election as an officer, an individual must be eligible to serve as a representative from the
institution, must have at least a 2.5 cumulative GPA, must be enrolled at a

State University of New York campus and be nominated by a
representative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
341.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
